title: Pashley Unveils New Pashley Roadfinder Line of Handcrafted Steel Bikes
content:
Dating back to 1926, UK brand Pashley unveils a new drop bar performance range of handcrafted steel bikes under the Pashley Roadfinder name.

Read the full article at Pashley Unveils New Pashley Roadfinder Line of Handcrafted Steel Bikes on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
